title: Media Planner
description:
TrendWave Media Seeks a Media Planner (Full-Time)

TrendWave Media, a São Paulo-based media agency, optimizes campaigns for clients in retail, education, and tech. We’re looking for a dedicated Media Planner to join our team and craft effective media strategies.

Role Summary
You’ll plan and execute media campaigns to maximize client ROI, working with creative and analytics teams to deliver impactful results.

Key Tasks
- Develop media plans for digital and traditional channels.
- Analyze audience data using Nielsen or Comscore.
- Negotiate with media vendors for optimal placements.
- Track campaign performance and optimize spend.
- Collaborate with creative teams for campaign alignment.
- Conduct market research to inform strategies.
- Stay updated on media trends.
- Prepare performance reports for clients.
- Support client meetings to discuss plans.
- Contribute to budget planning for campaigns.

Qualifications
We seek candidates with 2–3 years of experience in media planning, proficient in Nielsen or Comscore. Strong negotiation and analytical skills are essential, along with experience in digital and traditional media. A Bachelor’s degree in marketing, advertising, or a related field is required.

Why TrendWave?
We’re a team that values strategic thinking and creativity. Our hybrid work model offers flexibility, and we support your growth with training programs and access to media tools. You’ll work on diverse projects in a collaborative environment.

Benefits
Health plan
Meal vouchers
20 days of annual leave
Professional development budget
Access to media tools
Team social events

Join Us
If you’re passionate about media planning, apply now to join TrendWave Media!
